text: Ate tusim usa aurata varage na bano jisa ne apana mihanata nala kati'a suta, tote-tote kara dita. Tusim apani'am sahu'am nu kalesa paida karana da raha bana'unde ho. Kevala isa la'i ki ika saparada duji saparada tom vadha jave. Ate alaha isa rahim tuhada imatihana lainda hai ate uha ki'amata de dina usa ciza nu cagi tar'ham tuhade sahamane pragata kara devega, jisa la'i tusim matabheda karade rahe ho
